auditor_certification.subject: IoS-005

sovereign_auditor_check.rationale: IoS-005 has NO WRITE ACCESS to fhq_positions, fhq_orders, or fhq_execution. Separation of concerns maintained per ADR-013.

one_true_source_check.rationale: All G1 audit inputs originated from canonical sources. Hash chain integrity verified.

auditor_certification.certification_rationale: IoS-005 Forecast Calibration & Skill Engine is compliant with all governance requirements. The audit engine operates as a non-interfering observer with read-only access to canonical data and write access only to analytics schema.

lars_recommendation.rationale: p > 0.05 indicates strategy performance cannot be statistically distinguished from randomness

vega_decision.rationale: VEGA concurs with LARS recommendation. IoS-004 demonstrates strong absolute performance (Sharpe 2.61) but lacks statistical proof of skill (p_bootstrap=0.501, p_permutation=0.173). Per IoS-005 Expected Null Result Regime clause, this is scientifically expected. Strategy is classified as EXPERIMENTAL with 0.5x risk multiplier until p < 0.05 is achieved across both bootstrap and permutation tests.
conditions: Out-of-sample validation required before upgrade to PROVEN
VEGA review mandatory if p < 0.05 achieved

risk_determination.escalation_trigger: p < 0.05 on both bootstrap and permutation

conditions: IoS-004 tagged as EXPERIMENTAL in fhq_meta.ios_registry
Risk multiplier 0.5x enforced for capital allocation
VEGA review mandatory upon significance achievement
